name: ZekeLexSupport
_source: speak;Zeke;How are you holding up, Lex?
speak;Lex;Oh, boss. Doing just fine, thanks.
speak;Zeke;You can drop the "boss." We're all friends here.
speak;Lex;Oh, sorry. I guess I'm used to more stuck-up employers.
speak;Zeke;It's alright. Say, Lex. What got you into the mercenary business, anyway?
speak;Lex;I want to help people in need. Whether it's fighting bandits, or helping people like Sky{tgm}...{tgm} as long as I can make a difference, that's what counts.
speak;Zeke;I{tgm}...{tgm} think that's a story best saved for another day. There are foes approaching.
